oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Isaac Benson's pass
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Isaac Benson's pass from the Office of Provost Marshal General East Tennessee. It was signed October 8, 1863 by C.D. Rhodes (Charles Daniel Rhodes) of Companies G & H, 103 Ohio Infantry. The gives permission for passage for Isaac Benson of McMinn County by order of Major General Philip Sheridan.
